thread.title: Pet Deposit
thread.title_full: Backcountry Gear reviewed by Pet Deposit

author: Pet Deposit
title: Pet Deposit
text: I was looking for a particular Optimus camping stove and came across Backcountry Gear -- who had it on sale for a great price. It must have been one of the last few in stock, because the price was 10 lower than even the pretty low price on Amazon. Throw in a 10%-off coupon and free shipping on orders over 49 and I was a very happy person. They sent the stove out the next day and it arrived within 3 days, perfectly packaged and in good working order. I have around 4-5 primary sites I go to when I'm looking to get a good price on outdoor gear and clothing. I have added Backcountry Gear to that list.
